questions.question: What could happen if a resistor is not used in the circuit?

answers.a: Excessive current could damage the Raspberry Pi or burn out the LED

questions.question: Why is it necessary to turn off the Raspberry Pi before connecting hardware?

answers.a: To avoid damaging the components due to static discharge or short circuits
answers.b: To prevent data loss on the Raspberry Pi
answers.c: To ensure that the GPIO pins are not sending signals during the connection
